long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome extension "Chub.ai to Charluv.com Importer" is a powerful tool for users of online character creation services. With this extension, users can easily transfer their character designs from the popular character creation website Chub.ai to the character chat site Charluv.com.

Using the extension is incredibly simple. After installing it in your Chrome browser, simply navigate to Chub.ai and create your desired character design. Once you've finished, click on the "Export" button and select "Charluv.com" from the list of available options. The extension will automatically transfer your character data to Charluv.com and add it to your account.
